text: Maabaho munhu imwenga yeli hambule mwiko kezasola hisopo na kezadivabika muna yamazi yayo, maabaho kezamizila hema na via vose vili mgati yake na wanhu weli mgati. Iviya kezammizila munhu yoyadalise vuha da munhu hebu mtufi wa munhu yoyakomigwe hebu yoyadanganike ifa imanyika, hebu yoyadalise leme.
